thread.title: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. nearly cries after win vs. San Francisco 49ers
thread.title_full: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. nearly cries after win vs. San Francisco 49ers | NJ.com

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: WATCH: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. nearly cries after win vs. San Francisco 49ers
text:
Was it the fact that the Giants nearly blew another game in the fourth quarter this season that brought receiver Odell Beckham Jr. to the verge of tears in his postgame interview with NBC's Michele Tafoya?
Was it his potential embarrassment about a hamstring injury that may have come on a touchdown dance -- although he insists he injured it several plays before his score.
Was it the abuse he took during the week from the Buffalo Bills (who called him a cheap-shot whiner) and Jets cornerback Antonio Cromartie (who called him a one-year wonder)?
